conclusion: Analyze paths liquid would take based on baffle direction.
Baffle below A directs flow towards the left.
Liquid continues leftward by subsequent baffles.
Liquid reaches bottom left area, leading to container D.
Baffle below B directs flow towards the right.
Liquid continues rightward by subsequent baffles.
Liquid reaches bottom right area, leading to container E.
Baffle below C directs flow towards the right.
Liquid continues rightward by subsequent baffles.
Liquid reaches bottom right area, leading to container E.
Direction of baffles determines liquid path.
Baffles act as guides directing liquid left or right.
Tracing liquid path along baffles predicts final destination.
Liquid from point A flows into container D.
Liquid from points B and C flows into container E.
